TopicTitle: Launching vessel from VAB spawns on top of an existing vessel (on Duna)

Articles.Content:
On a previous mission, I had landed a vessel on Duna.

Now, when I build a vessel in the VAB and launch it, KSP hangs on a loading screen while in the background I hear a series of crashing noises which eventually die out. The hang continues for some time, but I left KSP in the background and checked it after several hours, and it turns out the new vehicle had spawned on top of the vessel on Duna!

Screenshot below: this craft file included launch clamps which you can see extend to the top of the screen (though the bug happens regardless of which craft file I use or which launch site I choose).

System Details

  • KSP Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
  • Operating System: Windows 10
  • CPU: AMD 5800X3D
  • GPU: NVIDIA RTX 2070 Super
  • GPU Driver Version    528.49
  • RAM: 32GB

I can share the save file if requested. To reproduce, I load the save, open a craft in the VAB, and launch it.
